data_table.description: The subject consent data table contains subject IDs, consent group information, subject aliases, and affection status. All subjects are controls for studying continuous traits from echocardiography exams.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject

variable.name: SUBJECT_SOURCE
variable.description: Repository name for dbGaP study also containing this individual

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the SUBJECT_SOURCE repository
